description: Excavation of sub-basement, redevelopment of Nos. 5-6 Yarmouth Place, alterations and extension to provide enlarged sixth and new seventh floor storeys and installation of plant at basement, ground and fourth floor levels. Use of extended and altered building as 36 x flats (Class C3) (an additional 28 above existing), car / cycle parking and a shop (Class A1) or financial and professional institution (Class A2) at part ground floor level. Internal alterations. (SITE COMPRISES 96-100 PICCADILLY AND 5-6 YARMOUTH PLACE).
